Posts.Content: I am a 41yr old single mom that is supposed to start chemotherapy in a few days, but am very unsure if I want to go through with it. Im terrified and cant seem to wrap my head around why I would want to walk into the hospital feeling great, and knowing that they are going to poison me and I wont ever feel the way I do now again. Would love to hear someone else thats been through chemo tell me its worth the risks.
Posts.Title: Unsure about chemo
